actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill providing that certain privately owned irrigable lands in Milk River project in Montana shall be deemed to be excess lands.

summary.text: Provides that specified privately owned irrigable lands in Milk River project in Montana shall be deemed to be excess lands as such term is used in Federal reclamation laws. Restricts the furnishing of water from the Milk River to such excess lands.

titles.title: A bill providing that certain privately owned irrigable lands in Milk River project in Montana shall be deemed to be excess lands.
